overview: A biopic of Merlin Carothers, who was imprisoned, but on release served as a combat paratrooper in World War II, as a guard of General Dwight D. Eisenhower, and later as a Lt. Colonel in the U.S. Army Chaplaincy in Korea, the Dominican Republic conflict, and in Vietnam. His inspirational story shows the power of "giving praise in all things".
title: Prison to Praise
